'''House Selmy''' is a vassal house from the [[Stormlands]] that holds fealty to [[House Baratheon]] of [[Storm's End]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Selmy is a house sworn to Storm's End. Their seat is Harvest Hall and their sigil is three stalks of yellow wheat on brown.
sections.Known members: * Ser [[Barristan Selmy]], known as "Barristan the Bold", former Lord Commander of the [[Kingsguard]]. Â Since being dismissed by King [[Joffrey Baratheon]],Â he tracked down [[Daenerys Targaryen]] and swore his loyalty to her.
